name: Bowlerama
description:
My hobby for the last year has been working my way through a popular online c# / Unity course. This is my take on one of the games in the course.

I am a music maker and did this to better understand the tools an indie game development team might have to work with.

Much of the scripting in game is heavily reliant on the tutorials, which I edited to my needs and mainly towards polishing mechanics, making UI adjustments and for audio integration...which, brings me onto my favorite bit;

The sound effects and music are all my own work and using a middle ware program called Wwise, I was able to get something working with much less effort than through Unity alone.

Perhaps some one who appreciates my efforts and understand the value of music in games will find something here!
